Delete Lithology Descriptions and Remarks

Click here to see this page in full context

Maximize screen to view table of contents*

Back Forward

Delete Lithology Descriptions or Remarks

Select the text and hit Delete on your keyboard.

Or,

Right click on the text and select Delete.

On the Home tab, select Arrows Keys Nudge. Use the keyboard arrow keys to move the text to its new position.

A confirmation dialog box will open. Click Yes.

Using the Track Text Manager

Individual and multiple entries can be deleted via the track text manager which lists the information in a table format. This may be easier to navigate than locating entries on the plot.

On the Tools tab, select Track Text Manager.

Select the Track containing the horizontal lithology descriptions or remarks text you wish to delete. The grid will populate will all text entries in the selected track.

Identify the entry you wish to delete and select the grey cell adjacent to highlight the row. Select as many rows are required.

Clear the In-Use check box.

Click Update. If multiple entries are selected a message will appear - confirm Yes to delete.

Click Exit.

Back Forward
